channel.title: Puttin Client on Website
channel.description: Ok, so i made a client for my server. Now how do i host the client on a webpage like moparisthebest.com? any help is much appreciated[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 02:07:41 PM[/size][hr]anyone helP? :confused:

item.title: Puttin Client on Website
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

mitchtheblonde:

Ok, so i made a client for my server. Now how do i host the client on a webpage like moparisthebest.com? any help is much appreciated[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 02:07:41 PM[/size][hr]anyone helP?

Maybe if you look at some of the other online clients like xlinescape. Bluur (the owner) just used a free website hoster to host his web client so why dont you go to xlinescape client and then right click, view source. Edit all you want, but im not sure how you jar your client…sorry i wrote in a rush, p m me tomorrow

Read full topic

item.title: Puttin Client on Website
item.dc:creator: @dannate dannate
item.description:
@dannate wrote:

u seed open up cmd???
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 03:20:40 PM[/size][hr]2secs ill go look it up for u kk
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 03:26:51 PM[/size][hr]First of all we will cover those smart decisions. First off we need a good source! There are many good sources out there and I advise to take a source that is somewhat edited by someone else and that is based off of a great original source. I hear that a good source is Pimpscape, and I personal favorite is Project 16 version 6 edit 8. I have not used P16 in a long time but it is the least bugged source available. Ok now we need a good and easy name to remember/type. First of all think up an awesome name that has not been used before (or is very scarce.) Then you can add some 1337 to it or chane caps when on server page. I think we can do names like these:

taharokscape

1337mopar1337

1337mod1337

0wn@g3sc@p3
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2007, 03:34:19 PM[/size][hr] :eek: i still cant do my router thing =(((((((((((((((((((((((((
